examples.example: 今天的天气格外好，我的心情也随之变得格外舒畅。

translate.english: Today's weather is exceptionally good, and my mood also becomes exceptionally comfortable accordingly.

examples.example: 当我看到那美丽的风景时，心情瞬间变得愉悦起来。

translate.english: When I saw that beautiful scenery, my mood instantly became cheerful.

examples.example: 每天保持乐观的心态，心情自然会一直愉悦。

translate.english: Keep an optimistic attitude every day, and the mood will naturally be pleasant all the time.
